overview: "From the beginning my intention has been to tell a story with a social background.  But I didn't want a classic story, I needed someone who saw the short film to feel what our protagonist feels: the anguish, the overwhelm, the fear and finally the liberation.  After a period of documentation and analysis, I planned a story that would entail a sensory journey for the viewer in which they could feel identified in some way." - Susana Ram√≠rez de Arellano, director.
title: Dilo
